data.title: Marvin Williams Joins Charlotte Hornets Staff
data.meta_description: Former North Carolina Tar Heels and Charlotte Hornets forward Marvin Williams has joined the...
data.text:
Former North Carolina Tar Heels and Charlotte Hornets forward Marvin Williams has joined the Hornets organization in a basketball operations role. Williams, who spent parts of six seasons with the Hornets during his NBA career, now looks to impart the wisdom from his playing days to the current roster as a part of his new player development role. (Swarm & Sting)
